title: Kamkhan
data: Kamkhan (Persian: كامخان, also Romanized as Kāmkhān and Kām Khān)[1] is a village in Dust Mohammad Rural District, in the Central District of Hirmand County, Sistan and Baluchestan Province, Iran. At the 2006 census, its population was 177, in 50 families.[2] This Hirmand County location article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
